title: Which Pokémon Are You?
description: Discover which Pokémon matches your personality in this PMD(Pokemon Mystery Dungeon) inspired quiz!
introduction: Hi, welcome to Pokeforms! This is just a page to test progress bar and inputs. There will be 5 questions to answer.
introduction2: On the end you'll have an email form, do not expect to receive any email, because the system is not implemented yet. Sorry for the incovenience.
haveFun: Still, I wish you have a good time here!
question: Question
messagePlaceholder: Hey! I discovered I'm a {pokemon}! Take the quiz to find out which Pokémon you are...
emailSuccess: Email not sent because is not implemented yet!

questions.q1: What is your preferred approach to challenging situations?
questions.q2: How would you describe yourself in a group of friends?
questions.q3: Which environment do you prefer to relax and recharge?
questions.q4: Which of these qualities best describes your greatest talent?
questions.q5: How do you usually make important life decisions?

options.brave1: Face them head-on with courage and determination
options.wise1: Plan carefully and analyze all options
options.friendly1: Seek help and collaboration with others
options.mysterious1: Follow my intuition and natural instinct
options.brave2: The natural leader who takes initiative
options.wise2: The wise counselor who always has good insights
options.friendly2: The loyal and trustworthy friend of everyone
options.mysterious2: The free spirit who is a bit mysterious
options.brave3: Mountains and open areas with wide views
options.wise3: Libraries, museums or quiet places to think
options.friendly3: Parks or squares full of people and friends
options.mysterious3: Serene forests or places with mystery
options.brave5: With courage and conviction, trusting my judgment
options.wise5: By carefully analyzing all pros and cons
options.friendly5: By consulting close people and considering opinions
options.mysterious5: By following my heart and intuitive feelings

pikachu.name: Pikachu
pikachu.description: You are energetic, friendly and love making new friends! Like Pikachu, you bring joy to everyone around you and have a loyal heart. Your sociable and optimistic nature makes you always desired company.

charizard.name: Charizard
charizard.description: You are brave, determined and a natural leader! Like Charizard, you face challenges head-on and inspire others with your strength. Your confidence and ambition lead you to great achievements.

alakazam.name: Alakazam
alakazam.description: You are intelligent, strategic and always think before acting! Like Alakazam, your wisdom and planning are your greatest strengths. Your sharp mind solves problems that others consider impossible.

gengar.name: Gengar
gengar.description: You are mysterious, creative and have a free spirit! Like Gengar, you see the world uniquely and surprise everyone with your adaptability. Your humor and mystery make you fascinating.

lucario.name: Lucario
lucario.description: You are wise, perceptive and have strong intuition! Like Lucario, you can sense others' emotions and act with wisdom. Your combination of strength and sensitivity is admirable.

eevee.name: Eevee
eevee.description: You are adaptable, friendly and have incredible potential! Like Eevee, you easily connect with everyone and adapt to any situation. Your versatility opens many possibilities.

dragonite.name: Dragonite
dragonite.description: You are powerful but gentle, a true hero! Like Dragonite, you combine impressive strength with a kind heart. Your protective nature inspires confidence in everyone.

mew.name: Mew
mew.description: You are enigmatic, playful and full of surprises! Like Mew, your curious nature and unique abilities make you special. You see magic where others see only the ordinary.
